```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import altair as alt

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

 
def preview_data(df):
  df_list = []
  altair_plot = alt.Chart(df).mark_bar().encode(
    alt.X(df.index),
    alt.Y(df["Random Numbers"])
  )
  df_list.append(df.head)
  df_list.append(altair_plot)
  return df_list
	
preview_data(data)
```
